trans-unit.source: Performs composition for containers.
trans-unit.target: 執行容器的撰寫。

trans-unit.source: This class is used internally by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會在內部使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer>。

trans-unit.source: You should generally not use it unless you are authoring a container.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不應該使用它除非您撰寫一個容器。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類型會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider" /> that provides the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> access to <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider" />，提供 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> 對 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> 物件的存取。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider" /> that provides the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> access to <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider" />，提供 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> 對 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> 物件的存取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if thread safety is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要安全執行緒，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> class, optionally in thread-safe mode.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> 類別的新執行個體，可以選擇是否為安全執行緒模式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider" /> that provides the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> access to <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider" />，提供 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> 對 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> 物件的存取。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies options that affect the behavior of the engine.
trans-unit.target: 指定影響引擎行為之選項的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> class with the specified options.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的選項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> 使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>。

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 方法會將 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ImportEngine" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: The part to preview the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要預覽匯入的部分。

trans-unit.source: The composition transaction to use, or <see langword="null" /> for no composition transaction.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的撰寫交易，<see langword="null" /> 表示沒有撰寫交易。

trans-unit.source: Previews all the required imports for the specified part to make sure that they can be satisfied, without actually setting them.
trans-unit.target: 預覽在指定部分的所有必要匯入，以便不用實際設定，就確定能夠滿足這些匯入。

trans-unit.source: The part to release the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要釋放匯入的部分。

trans-unit.source: The composition transaction to use, or <see langword="null" /> for no composition transaction.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的撰寫交易，<see langword="null" /> 表示沒有撰寫交易。

trans-unit.source: Releases all the exports used to satisfy the imports of the specified part.
trans-unit.target: 釋放所有匯出，這些匯出用以滿足所指定部分的匯入。

trans-unit.source: The part to satisfy the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要滿足其匯入的組件。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies the imports of the specified part.
trans-unit.target: 滿足所指定部分的匯入。

trans-unit.source: The part to satisfy the imports of.
trans-unit.target: 要滿足其匯入的組件。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies the imports of the specified part without registering them for recomposition.
trans-unit.target: 滿足所指定部分的匯入，而不需註冊重新撰寫。
